# Clash Display Font Files

Place the following Clash Display font files in this directory:

## Required Files:

- `ClashDisplay-Regular.woff2`
- `ClashDisplay-Regular.woff`
- `ClashDisplay-Medium.woff2`
- `ClashDisplay-Medium.woff`
- `ClashDisplay-Semibold.woff2`
- `ClashDisplay-Semibold.woff`
- `ClashDisplay-Bold.woff2`
- `ClashDisplay-Bold.woff`

## Where to get Clash Display:

1. **Fontshare** - https://www.fontshare.com/fonts/clash-display (Free)
2. Download the font family
3. Convert TTF/OTF to WOFF2/WOFF using online tools like:
   - https://cloudconvert.com/ttf-to-woff2
   - https://transfonter.org/

## Notes:

- WOFF2 is the modern format with better compression
- WOFF is the fallback for older browsers
- font-display: swap is used for better performance
